No Second Thoughts Speaking in an interview with Diane Sawyer of ABC News earlier this week, Donald Rumsfeld put it this way: What you know today can help you unthink your thinking about tomorrow. It can't help you with things you were thinking about back then, he said.`` Back then, there was reasonable confidence that[ Saddam Hussein ] had these weapons.'' Nor does Donald Rumsfeld register second thoughts about the Pentagon's crucial failure to capture Osama bin Laden in the Battle of Tora

of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011. Both on-premises and cloud-based versions of the platform will be available in 40 markets and 41 languages starting Feb. 28. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night.`` It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
